author: RDIL
body:
## PR Summary

My pal @ImgBotApp optimized all the images present in the repository.  

## PR Checklist

- [X] [PR has a meaningful title]
- [X] [Summarized changes]
- [X] [Change is not breaking]
- [X] [Make sure all `.h`, `.cpp`, `.cs`, `.ps1` and `.psm1` files have the correct copyright header]
- [X] This PR is ready to merge and is not [Work in Progress]
- **Testing - New and feature**
    - [X] Can be tested right away

comments.author: RDIL
comments.body: Wait that's not my code thats failing

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: @RDIL Please rebase to get latest commits and pass CIs.

comments.author: RDIL
comments.body: That’s odd, some checks are still failing :(

comments.author: RDIL
comments.body:
Test failures:
Description: NewFileCatalogForFilesThatDoNotSupportEmbeddedSignatures
4037Name:        Test suite for NewFileCatalogAndTestFileCatalogCmdlets.NewAndTestCatalogTests PositiveTestCases when validation Succeeds.NewFileCatalogForFilesThatDoNotSupportEmbeddedSignatures
4038message:
4039Expected strings to be the same, but they were different.
4040String lengths are both 40.
4041Strings differ at index 0.
4042Expected: {B0E4B9F0BB21284AA0AF0D525C913420AD73DA6A}
4043But was:  {C1FCC65488C1DFF7F0D7C5F85F3091433AF09BBF}
4044-----------^
4045stack-trace:
4046at <ScriptBlock>, C:\projects\powershell\test\powershell\Modules\Microsoft.PowerShell.Security\FileCatalog.Tests.ps1: line 30
404730:                 $keyValue1 | Should -Be $keyValue2
40481 tests in test/powershell failed
4049if ($env:Purpose -eq 'ElevatedPesterTests_xUnit_Packaging'){ Invoke-AppveyorFinish }

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body:
@RDIL Please revert the file test/powershell/Modules/Microsoft.PowerShell.Security/TestData/CatalogTestData/TestImage.gif

It is used in our tests.

title: Optimize Images!
